projects.name: Barber App
description: Barber App that allows User's register, login, recover account and book services.
The Administrator Role allows see and cancel bookings, and manage services

projects.name: Hotel Esmeralda App
description: The Hotel Esmeralda App allows users to register, log in, book, contract services, and pay the cart price.
The Administrator Role allows see and cancel bookings, and manage services and rooms
